column2: the fourth [[Sons of Fëanor|son]] of [[Fëanor]]. It means "Dark Finwë"
column3: a reference to his dark hair. The [[Quenya]] word was formed using the noun ''[[more]]''
column5: which became ''[[mori-]]'' when added to his grandfather's name
column7: ''The names of the Sons of Fëanor with the legend of the fate of Amrod''</ref>
